content.json: # Azure SQL Database Elastic Pool Performance Monitor

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourceContainers 
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups"
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where type == "microsoft.sql/servers/elasticpools"
    | distinct resourceGroup, subscriptionId
) on resourceGroup, subscriptionId
| project resourceGroup
| order by resourceGroup asc

parameters.name: SqlElasticPool
parameters.label: SQL Elastic Pool
parameters.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) == "microsoft.sql/servers/elasticpools"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| project AffectedResource=id, resourceGroup

parameters.name: EPMetric
parameters.label: Metric
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"EPeDtuLimit", "label": "eDTU limit", "group": "eDTU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"EPeDtuPercentage", "label": "eDTU percentage", "group": "eDTU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"EPeDtuUsed", "label": "eDTU used", "group": "eDTU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"EPCpuLimit", "label": "CPU limit", "group": "CPU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"EPCpuPercentage", "label": "CPU percentage", "group": "CPU", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPCpuUsed", "label": "CPU used", "group": "CPU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"EPSqlInstanceCpuPercent", "label": "SQL instance CPU percent", "group": "CPU", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPWorkersPercentage", "label": "Workers percentage", "group": "CPU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"EPSqlInstanceMemoryPercent", "label": "SQL instance memory percent", "group": "Memory", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPDataIoPercentage", "label": "Data IO percentage", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPDataMaxSize", "label": "Data max size", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPDataSpaceAllocated", "label": "Data space allocated", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPDataSpaceUsedValue", "label": "Data space used", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPDataSpaceUsedPercent", "label": "Data space used percent", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPLogIoPercentage", "label": "Log IO percentage", "group": "Log IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPSessionsCount", "label": "Sessions count", "group": "Sessions", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPSessionsPercentage", "label": "Sessions percentage", "group": "Sessions", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPTempdbDataFileSizeKilobytes", "label": "Tempdb Data File Size Kilobytes", "group": "Tempdb", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPTempdbLogFileSizeKilobytes", "label": "Tempdb Log File Size Kilobytes", "group": "Tempdb", "selected":true},
    { "value":"EPTempdbPercentLogUsed", "label": "Tempdb Percent Log Used", "group": "Tempdb", "selected":false}
]

content.json: ### Click an elastic pool to view the list of databases in the pool

content.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) == 'microsoft.sql/servers/elasticpools'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| where id in ({SqlElasticPool})
| project
    ResourceId = id
    , Region = location
    , tier = tostring(sku.tier)
    , family = tostring(sku.family)
    , dtus = case(kind contains "vcore", 0, sku.capacity)
    , vcores = case(kind contains "vcore", sku.capacity, 0)
    , minCapacity = toint(properties.perDatabaseSettings.minCapacity)
    , maxCapacity = toint(toint(properties.perDatabaseSettings.maxCapacity))
    , state = tostring(properties.state)
    , maintenanceConfigurationId = tostring(properties.maintenanceConfigurationId)
    , zoneRedundant = tostring(properties.zoneRedundant)
    , creationDate = tostring(properties.creationDate)
    , maxSizeGB = properties.maxSizeBytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
    , tags
    , resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup)
    , subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
content.title: Elastic Pool Info

parameters.name: SqlDatabase
parameters.label: SQL Database
parameters.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) == 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases'
| extend elasticPoolId = tolower(tostring(properties.elasticPoolId))
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where tolower(type) == 'microsoft.sql/servers/elasticpools'
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | where id == "{ResourceId}"
    | project elasticPoolId = tolower(tostring(id))
) on elasticPoolId
| where name != 'master'
| project AffectedResource=id

content.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) == 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases'
| where id in ({SqlDatabase})
| extend elasticPoolId = tolower(tostring(properties.elasticPoolId))
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where tolower(type) == 'microsoft.sql/servers/elasticpools'
    | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
    | where id == "{ResourceId}"
    | project elasticPoolId = tolower(tostring(id))
) on elasticPoolId
| where name != 'master'
| project
    ResourceId = id
    , Region = location
    , tier = tostring(sku.tier)
    , status = tostring(properties.status)
    , currentBackupStorageRedundancy = tostring(properties.currentBackupStorageRedundancy)
    , requestedBackupStorageRedundancy = tostring(properties.requestedBackupStorageRedundancy)
    , maintenanceConfigurationId = tostring(properties.maintenanceConfigurationId)
    , zoneRedundant = tostring(properties.zoneRedundant)
    , collation = tostring(properties.catalogCollation)
    , creationDate = tostring(properties.creationDate)
    , earliestRestoreDate = tostring(properties.earliestRestoreDate)
    , maxSizeGB = properties.maxSizeBytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
    , readScale = tostring(properties.readScale)
    , isLedgerOn = tostring(properties.isLedgerOn)
    , tags
    , resourceGroup = strcat('/subscriptions/'
    , subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup), subscriptionId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId)
content.title: Database Info

parameters.name: Metric
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"DtuLimit", "label": "DTU limit", "group": "DTU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"DtuPercentage", "label": "DTU percentage", "group": "DTU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"DtuUsed", "label": "DTU used", "group": "DTU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"CpuLimit", "label": "CPU limit", "group": "CPU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"CpuPercentage", "label": "CPU percentage", "group": "CPU", "selected":true},
    { "value":"CpuUsed", "label": "CPU used", "group": "CPU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"WorkersPercentage", "label": "Workers percentage", "group": "CPU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"InMemoryOltpStoragePercent", "label": "In-Memory OLTP storage percent", "group": "Memory", "selected":true},
    { "value":"DataIoPercentage", "label": "Data IO percentage", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"DataSpaceAllocated", "label": "Data space allocated", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"DataSpaceUsedValue", "label": "Data space used", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"DataSpaceUsedPercent", "label": "Data space used percent", "group": "Data IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"LogIoPercentage", "label": "Log IO percentage", "group": "Log IO", "selected":true},
    { "value":"Deadlocks", "label": "Deadlocks", "group": "Locks", "selected":true},
    { "value":"SessionsCount", "label": "Sessions count", "group": "Sessions", "selected":true},
    { "value":"SessionsPercentage", "label": "Sessions percentage", "group": "Sessions", "selected":true},
    { "value":"FullBackupStorageSize", "label": "Full backup storage size", "group": "Backups", "selected":false},
    { "value":"DifferentialBackupStorageSize", "label": "Differential backup storage size", "group": "Backups", "selected":false},
    { "value":"LogBackupStorageSize", "label": "Log backup storage size", "group": "Backups", "selected":false},
    { "value":"SuccessfulLedgerDigestUploads", "label": "Successful Ledger Digest Uploads", "group": "Ledger", "selected":false},
    { "value":"FailedLedgerDigestUploads", "label": "Failed Ledger Digest Uploads", "group": "Ledger", "selected":false}
]

content.json: ### To review Query Store metrics you will need to point to the Log Analytics Workspace that is capturing the Query Store diagnostic settings

parameters.name: ResourceGroupLA
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourceContainers 
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups"
| join kind = inner (
    resources
    | where type == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
    | distinct resourceGroup, subscriptionId
) on resourceGroup, subscriptionId
| project resourceGroup
| order by resourceGroup asc

parameters.name: LogAnalytics
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroupLA})
| project AffectedResource=id, resourceGroup

parameters.name: QSMetric
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"DurationMinutes", "label": "Duration"},
    { "value":"CpuMinutes", "label": "CPU"},
    { "value":"LogicalReadsMB", "label": "Logical Reads"},
    { "value":"PhysicalReadsMB", "label": "Physical Reads"},
    { "value":"PageServerReadsMB", "label": "Page Server Reads"},
    { "value":"LogicalWritesMB", "label": "Logical Writes"},
    { "value":"QueryMemoryUsedMB", "label": "Query Memory Used"},
    { "value":"LogMBUsed", "label": "Log Used"},
    { "value":"WaitTimeMinutes", "label": "Wait Time"}
]

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == "QueryStoreRuntimeStatistics"
| where _ResourceId in~({SqlDatabase})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
| extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
| extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
| extend Resource = strcat(extract(".+/SERVERS/([^/]+)/.+", 1, ResourceId), "/", extract(".+/DATABASES/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)).tolower()
| where start_time {TimeRange}
| where end_time {TimeRange}
| summarize DurationMinutes = round(sum(duration_d) / 60000000, 3) by Resource, end_time
| render timechart
content.title: Duration Minutes

| summarize CpuMinutes = round(sum(cpu_time_d) / 60000000, 3) by Resource, end_time
| render timechart

| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == "QueryStoreRuntimeStatistics"
| where _ResourceId in~({SqlDatabase})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
| extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
| extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
| extend Resource = strcat(extract(".+/SERVERS/([^/]+)/.+", 1, ResourceId), "/", extract(".+/DATABASES/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)).tolower()
| where start_time {TimeRange}
| where end_time {TimeRange}
| summarize QueryMemoryUsedMB = round(sum(query_max_used_memory_d / count_executions_d) / 128, 3) by Resource, end_time
| render timechart
content.title: Query Memory Used MB

items.name: query - Sql Query Max Used Memory MB

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == "QueryStoreRuntimeStatistics"
| where _ResourceId in~({SqlDatabase})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
| extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
| extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
| extend Resource = strcat(extract(".+/SERVERS/([^/]+)/.+", 1, ResourceId), "/", extract(".+/DATABASES/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)).tolower()
| where start_time {TimeRange}
| where end_time {TimeRange}
| summarize LogMBUsed = round(sum(log_bytes_used_d) / 1024 / 1024, 3) by Resource, end_time
| render timechart
content.title: Log MB Used

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == "QueryStoreWaitStatistics"
| where _ResourceId in~({SqlDatabase})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
| extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
| extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
| extend Resource = strcat(extract(".+/SERVERS/([^/]+)/.+", 1, ResourceId), "/", extract(".+/DATABASES/(.+)", 1, ResourceId)).tolower()
| where start_time {TimeRange}
| where end_time {TimeRange}
| summarize WaitTimeMinutes = round(sum(total_query_wait_time_ms_d) / 60000, 3) by Resource, end_time
| render timechart
content.title: Wait Time Minutes

content.json: ### Click a database to view the worst performing queries

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.label: Order by
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"ExecutionCount", "label": "Execution Count", "selected":false},
    { "value":"DurationMinutes", "label": "Duration", "selected":true},
    { "value":"CpuMinutes", "label": "CPU", "selected":false},
    { "value":"LogicalReadsMB", "label": "Logical Reads", "selected":false},
    { "value":"PhysicalReadsMB", "label": "Physical Reads", "selected":false},
    { "value":"PageServerReadsMB", "label": "Page Server Reads", "selected":false},
    { "value":"LogicalWritesMB", "label": "Logical Writes", "selected":false},
    { "value":"QueryMemoryUsedMB", "label": "Query Memory Used", "selected":false},
    { "value":"LogMBUsed", "label": "Log Used", "selected":false},
    { "value":"WaitTimeMinutes", "label": "Wait Time", "selected":false}
]

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == "QueryStoreRuntimeStatistics"
| where _ResourceId in~({SqlDatabase})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
| extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
| extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
| extend Resource = _ResourceId
| where start_time {TimeRange}
| where end_time {TimeRange}
| summarize ExecutionCount = sum(count_executions_d), QueryCount = count_distinct(query_id_d), AvgRowcount = round(avg(rowcount_d)), DurationMinutes = round(sum(duration_d) / 60000000, 3), CpuMinutes = round(sum(cpu_time_d) / 60000000, 3), AvgDop = round(avg(dop_d / count_executions_d)), LogicalReadsMB = round(sum(logical_io_reads_d) / 128, 3), PhysicalReadsMB = round(sum(physical_io_reads_d) / 128, 3), PageServerReadsMB = round(sum(page_server_reads_d) / 128, 3), LogicalWritesMB = round(sum(logical_io_writes_d) / 128, 3), QueryMemoryUsedMB = round(sum(query_max_used_memory_d / count_executions_d) / 128, 3), LogMBUsed = round(sum(log_bytes_used_d) / 1024 / 1024, 3) by Resource
| join kind = leftouter (
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category  == "QueryStoreWaitStatistics"
    | where _ResourceId in~({SqlDatabase})
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
    | extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
    | extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
    | extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
    | extend Resource = _ResourceId
    | where start_time {TimeRange}
    | where end_time {TimeRange}
    | summarize WaitTimeMinutes = round(sum(total_query_wait_time_ms_d) / 60000, 3) by Resource
) on Resource
| project Resource, ExecutionCount, QueryCount, AvgRowcount, DurationMinutes, CpuMinutes, AvgDop, LogicalReadsMB, PhysicalReadsMB, PageServerReadsMB, LogicalWritesMB, QueryMemoryUsedMB, LogMBUsed, WaitTimeMinutes = case(isnull(WaitTimeMinutes), 0.00, WaitTimeMinutes)
| order by {OrderBy} desc
content.title: Query store totals by database

content.json: ### Click a query to view the worst performing query plans

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == "QueryStoreRuntimeStatistics"
| where _ResourceId == "{Resource}"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
| extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
| extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
| extend Resource = _ResourceId
| where start_time {TimeRange}
| where end_time {TimeRange}
| summarize ExecutionCount = sum(count_executions_d), PlanCount = count_distinct(plan_id_d), AvgRowcount = round(avg(rowcount_d)), DurationMinutes = round(sum(duration_d) / 60000000, 3), CpuMinutes = round(sum(cpu_time_d) / 60000000, 3), AvgDop = round(avg(dop_d / count_executions_d)), LogicalReadsMB = round(sum(logical_io_reads_d) / 128, 3), PhysicalReadsMB = round(sum(physical_io_reads_d) / 128, 3), PageServerReadsMB = round(sum(page_server_reads_d) / 128, 3), LogicalWritesMB = round(sum(logical_io_writes_d) / 128, 3), QueryMemoryUsedMB = round(sum(query_max_used_memory_d / count_executions_d) / 128, 3), LogMBUsed = round(sum(log_bytes_used_d) / 1024 / 1024, 3) by Resource, QueryId = query_id_d
| join kind = leftouter (
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category  == "QueryStoreWaitStatistics"
    | where _ResourceId == "{Resource}"
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
    | extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
    | extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
    | extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
    | extend Resource = _ResourceId
    | where start_time {TimeRange}
    | where end_time {TimeRange}
    | summarize WaitTimeMinutes = round(sum(total_query_wait_time_ms_d) / 60000, 3) by Resource, QueryId = query_id_d
) on Resource, QueryId
| project Resource, QueryId, ExecutionCount, PlanCount, AvgRowcount, DurationMinutes, CpuMinutes, AvgDop, LogicalReadsMB, PhysicalReadsMB, PageServerReadsMB, LogicalWritesMB, QueryMemoryUsedMB, LogMBUsed, WaitTimeMinutes = case(isnull(WaitTimeMinutes), 0.00, WaitTimeMinutes)
| order by {OrderBy} desc
| take 25
content.title: Worst performing queries

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == "QueryStoreRuntimeStatistics"
| where _ResourceId == "{Resource}"
| where query_id_d == "{QueryId}"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
| extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
| extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
| extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
| extend Resource = _ResourceId
| where start_time {TimeRange}
| where end_time {TimeRange}
| summarize ExecutionCount = sum(count_executions_d), AvgRowcount = round(avg(rowcount_d)), DurationMinutes = round(sum(duration_d) / 60000000, 3), CpuMinutes = round(sum(cpu_time_d) / 60000000, 3), AvgDop = round(avg(dop_d / count_executions_d)), LogicalReadsMB = round(sum(logical_io_reads_d) / 128, 3), PhysicalReadsMB = round(sum(physical_io_reads_d) / 128, 3), PageServerReadsMB = round(sum(page_server_reads_d) / 128, 3), LogicalWritesMB = round(sum(logical_io_writes_d) / 128, 3), QueryMemoryUsedMB = round(sum(query_max_used_memory_d / count_executions_d) / 128, 3), LogMBUsed = round(sum(log_bytes_used_d) / 1024 / 1024, 3) by Resource, QueryId = query_id_d, PlanId = plan_id_d
| join kind = leftouter (
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category  == "QueryStoreWaitStatistics"
    | where _ResourceId == "{Resource}"
    | where query_id_d == "{QueryId}"
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} or TimeGenerated -1h {TimeRange}
    | extend interval_start_time_date = round(interval_start_time_d / 4294967296, 0), interval_end_time_date = round(interval_end_time_d / 4294967296, 0)
    | extend interval_start_time_time = interval_start_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_start_time_date, interval_end_time_time = interval_end_time_d - 4294967296 * interval_end_time_date
    | extend start_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_start_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_start_time_time / 300.0), end_time = datetime(1900-1-1) + time(1d) * interval_end_time_date + time(1s) * (interval_end_time_time / 300.0)
    | extend Resource = _ResourceId
    | where start_time {TimeRange}
    | where end_time {TimeRange}
    | summarize WaitTimeMinutes = round(sum(total_query_wait_time_ms_d) / 60000, 3) by Resource, QueryId = query_id_d, PlanId = plan_id_d
) on Resource, QueryId, PlanId
| project Resource, QueryId, PlanId, ExecutionCount, AvgRowcount, DurationMinutes, CpuMinutes, AvgDop, LogicalReadsMB, PhysicalReadsMB, PageServerReadsMB, LogicalWritesMB, QueryMemoryUsedMB, LogMBUsed, WaitTimeMinutes = case(isnull(WaitTimeMinutes), 0.00, WaitTimeMinutes)
| order by {OrderBy} desc
| take 25
content.title: Worst performing query plans
